basic_info.description: I’m a front-end developer based in the Philippines who loves to transform ideas into reality using code. With over 5 years of developing web applications using the latest front-end.
basic_info.philosophy: I’m a motivated individual who is reliable and confident with proven skills and experience. I enjoy problem solving and I am quick to learn with good communication skills and the ability to work efficiently as part of a team in a professional environment.
basic_info.preference: I’m open to work anywhere for the right opportunity.

projects.title: Recruitday.com
projects.description: Recruitday.com is a jobs platform that lets you find the perfect job or help others find theirs through referrals. Browse through job listings for the most current openings you can apply to or refer from multiple companies around the Philippines.

projects.title: Barhead Solutions
projects.description: Barhead is a specialised consulting firm focused on delivering business solutions leveraging Microsoft’s Digital Technology Stack. We believe that it is a combination of people, technology, and business drivers that underpin the most successful implementations.

education.title: Bachelor of Science in Information Technology

experience.title: Technical Consultants
experience.description: Have an adequate knowledge and experience in standard project implementation and software development methodologies. Support the other developers in the implementation efforts by understanding customer’s business, processes and system needs.
